title.value: Order Details for Diagnostic Imaging Report

description.value:
The purpose of this profile is to represent key elements of clinical relevance of a request for an imaging diagnostic investigation in a diagnostic imaging report context. This profile is intended to support the electronic exchange of diagnostic imaging reports between healthcare providers, and between healthcare providers and the My Health Record system infrastructure in Australia.
#### Must Support
In the context of this profile [Must Support](http://hl7.org/fhir/R4/conformance-rules.html#mustSupport) SHALL be interpreted as follows:
* The system SHALL be able to include the element when authoring a resource where data is available
* The system SHALL be able to store and retrieve the element
* The system SHALL be able to process resources containing the element

short.value: An order for an imaging examination

definition.value: A record of a request for imaging diagnostic investigations to be performed.

short.value: Authorising healthcare provider or organisation / program
